server.name: io.github.imbenrabi/financial-modeling-prep-mcp-server
server.description: MCP server for Financial Modeling Prep API with 250+ financial data tools
server.title: Financial Modeling Prep MCP Server

packageArguments.description: Financial Modeling Prep API access token
packageArguments.name: --fmp-token

packageArguments.description: Port number for HTTP server mode
packageArguments.name: --port

packageArguments.description: Comma-separated list of tool sets to load
packageArguments.name: --fmp-tool-sets

environmentVariables.description: Financial Modeling Prep API access token
environmentVariables.name: FMP_ACCESS_TOKEN

environmentVariables.description: Port number for HTTP server mode
environmentVariables.name: PORT

environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool sets to load
environmentVariables.name: FMP_TOOL_SETS
